ISSUE.TITLE: Add setting - Removed default selected store after save value
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce Version: 4.30 Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Go to Avance setting page Add new setting key and value and click on Add new record button. It removes default selected store from store dropdown ![13_allsetting](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13154058/78039301-94a96800-738b-11ea-82dc-abbccf78d558.gif)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce into develop # Conflicts: # upgradescripts/4.20-4.30 (under development)/upgrade.sql

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4469 from jeeckeman/fix-#4415 Fix #4415 for display of the default store after creation of setting
